doc:
Paul Ferris (composer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Ferris_(composer) 0 Richard Paul Ferris (2 May 1941 – 30 October 1995) was an English film composer and actor. Born in Corby, Northamptonshire, England, Ferris provided scores for various low budget British horror films during the late 1960s and early 1970s. Richard_Paul_Ferris ( 2_May_1941 – 30_October_1995 ) was an_English_film_composer_and_actor . Born in Corby , Northamptonshire , England , Ferris provided scores for various_low_budget_British_horror_films during the_late_1960s and early_1970s .
